law.catch_line: Subject to the authority of the Secretary, the Commission has the following powers and duties:...

text.section:
Subject to the authority of the Secretary, the Commission has the following powers and duties:
to adopt regulations necessary or appropriate to carry out this subtitle; and
to adopt regulations that establish and enforce standards for prior substance abuse by individuals applying for certification as a police officer.

Subject to subsections (c) and (d) of this section, the Commission shall adopt regulations on or before January 1, 2001, for a certified firearms safety training course required for an applicant for a regulated firearms purchase, rental, or transfer made on or after January 1, 2002.

The certified firearms safety training course required under subsection (b) of this section shall:
be offered by the Commission; or
contain a handgun safety component and be conducted by an individual or organization certified by:
the Commission;
the Department of Natural Resources;
the Department of State Police; or
any reputable organization:
that has as one of its objectives the promotion of competency and safety in handling handguns; and
whose course has been determined by the Commission to meet the regulations adopted by the Commission.
